Required Sections: Hero (headline + subheadline + CTA), Value Proposition, Features (3-5 items), CTA section, Footer
Recommended Sections: Testimonials, FAQ, Pricing preview, How It Works, Social proof, Stats/Numbers, Partner logos
Nav Requirements: Logo + Home link, Primary nav links (Features/Pricing/About), CTA button (Sign Up/Get Started), Mobile hamburger menu
Footer Requirements: Links (Product/Company/Legal/Social), Copyright notice, Legal links (Privacy/Terms), Newsletter signup optional
SEO Requirements: Title: Product - Tagline | Meta desc: 150-160 chars | Schema: Organization/Product | index follow | OG image 1200x630
Internal Links: Nav → Pricing page, Nav → Sign Up, Footer → About/Contact/Blog, CTA → Sign Up
Common Violations: Missing CTA above fold, No FAQ section, No social proof, Footer missing legal links, No mobile nav

Required Sections: Registration form (name/email/password), OAuth buttons (Google/GitHub), Link to Sign In, Submit button
Recommended Sections: Terms & conditions checkbox, Password strength indicator, Social proof sidebar, Progress indicator for multi-step
Nav Requirements: Minimal nav: Logo + Back to home, No main navigation (reduce distraction)
Footer Requirements: Minimal or none - keep focus on conversion
SEO Requirements: Title: Sign Up - Product | noindex recommended | No schema needed | Canonical to signup URL
Internal Links: Link to Sign In page, Link to Terms/Privacy, Back to Landing page
Common Violations: No link to Sign In, Missing OAuth options, No password validation feedback, No terms checkbox

Required Sections: Login form (email/password), OAuth buttons, Forgot password link, Link to Sign Up, Submit button
Recommended Sections: Remember me checkbox, 2FA input, Show/hide password toggle, Error message area
Nav Requirements: Minimal nav: Logo + Back to home
SEO Requirements: Title: Sign In - Product | noindex recommended | No schema needed
Internal Links: Link to Sign Up page, Link to Forgot Password, Redirect to Dashboard after login
Common Violations: No Forgot Password link, No link to Sign Up, No error feedback on wrong credentials, Missing OAuth

Keywords: dashboard, user panel, main app, overview
Required Sections: Top nav or Sidebar navigation, Stats overview cards, Recent activity feed, User menu (avatar + dropdown)
Recommended Sections: Quick action buttons, Notifications bell, Search bar, Onboarding checklist for new users, Charts/graphs
Nav Requirements: Sidebar: Logo + nav links + user menu, OR Top nav: Logo + search + notifications + avatar dropdown, Active state indicator
SEO Requirements: noindex nofollow | No public SEO needed | Title: Dashboard - Product
Internal Links: Nav → Settings, Nav → Profile, User menu → Logout, Links to all app sections
Common Violations: No user menu/logout, Missing empty states, No loading skeletons, Inconsistent navigation

Keywords: admin, admin panel, management, back office
Required Sections: Sidebar navigation, Stats overview cards, Data tables with pagination, User management section
Recommended Sections: Charts/analytics, Activity log, System health, Quick filters, Bulk actions, Export data
Nav Requirements: Sidebar: Logo + categorized nav (Overview/Users/Content/Settings/Analytics), Collapsible on mobile, Active state + hover
SEO Requirements: noindex nofollow | No public SEO needed | Title: Admin - Product
Internal Links: Nav → all admin sections, Breadcrumbs for nested pages, Quick links from stats cards
Common Violations: No role-based access indicators, Missing data table pagination, No search/filter, No breadcrumbs

Required Sections: Profile info form (name/email/avatar), Avatar upload, Password change section, Save/Cancel buttons
Recommended Sections: Notification preferences, Theme toggle (light/dark), Language selector, Danger zone (delete account), Connected accounts
Nav Requirements: Same as parent app nav (Dashboard nav), Settings sub-nav (Profile/Security/Notifications/Billing)
Internal Links: Back to Dashboard, Sub-nav between settings sections, Link to Billing/Plan
Common Violations: No save confirmation, Missing avatar upload, No danger zone confirmation dialog, Settings not grouped logically

Required Sections: Hero headline (value prop), Plan comparison cards (2-4 tiers), Feature comparison table, FAQ section, Final CTA
Recommended Sections: Monthly/Annual toggle with discount badge, Enterprise/Custom plan CTA, Money-back guarantee badge, Testimonial from customer
Nav Requirements: Main site nav (same as landing), Highlighted current plan for logged-in users
SEO Requirements: Title: Pricing - Product | index follow | Schema: Product with offers | OG with pricing info
Internal Links: Nav → Sign Up per plan, FAQ answers → relevant feature pages, CTA → checkout/signup, Back to Landing
Common Violations: No FAQ section, Missing feature comparison, No annual discount toggle, Popular plan not highlighted, No money-back guarantee

Required Sections: Post grid or list with thumbnails, Categories/tags filter, Search functionality, Pagination
Recommended Sections: Featured/pinned post at top, Sidebar with popular posts, Newsletter signup, Author filter, Reading time badges
Nav Requirements: Main site nav + Blog sub-nav (All/Categories), Search bar in nav or hero
Footer Requirements: Same as landing + blog-specific links, RSS feed link
SEO Requirements: Title: Blog - Product | index follow | Schema: CollectionPage | Pagination with rel next/prev
Internal Links: Each post → Blog Post page, Categories → filtered list, Author → author page, Sidebar → popular posts
Common Violations: No pagination, Missing categories, No search, Posts without thumbnails or dates, No featured post

Required Sections: Title (H1), Author name + avatar + date, Article content with proper headings, Share buttons (social)
Recommended Sections: Table of contents, Related posts, Comments section, Author bio box, Newsletter CTA, Breadcrumbs, Reading progress bar
Nav Requirements: Main site nav + Breadcrumbs (Blog > Category > Post title)
Footer Requirements: Same as landing footer + Related posts section
SEO Requirements: Title: Post Title | Blog Name | index follow | Schema: Article with author/date/image | OG article tags
Internal Links: Breadcrumbs → Blog List, Author → author page, Related posts → other articles, Share → social platforms, CTA → newsletter
Common Violations: No author/date info, Missing share buttons, No related posts, Poor heading hierarchy (skipping H2 to H4), No OG tags

Required Sections: Image gallery (multiple angles), Product title + price, Add to Cart button, Product description
Recommended Sections: Customer reviews section, Related products, Breadcrumbs, Size/variant selector, Wishlist button, Stock availability, Shipping info
Nav Requirements: Main site nav + Breadcrumbs (Shop > Category > Product), Cart icon with count in nav
SEO Requirements: Title: Product Name - Category | Store | index follow | Schema: Product with price/availability/reviews | OG product tags
Internal Links: Breadcrumbs → Category, Related products → other PDPs, Add to Cart → Cart/Checkout, Reviews → review section anchor
Common Violations: No breadcrumbs, Missing product schema, No reviews section, Single product image, No stock/availability info

Required Sections: Search input bar (pre-filled with query), Results list with snippets, Filter sidebar or top bar, Pagination
Recommended Sections: Sort options dropdown, Result count display, No results state with suggestions, Search within category, Active filter tags
Nav Requirements: Main site nav with search bar prominent
Footer Requirements: Minimal footer or same as main
SEO Requirements: noindex follow | Title: Search results for 'query' - Product | No schema needed | Canonical without query params
Internal Links: Each result → detail page, Filters → refined results, No results → suggested pages/categories
Common Violations: No 'no results' state, Missing filters, No result count, Search not pre-filled with query, Missing pagination

Required Sections: Order summary (items + total), Payment form (card/methods), Shipping address form, Place Order button
Recommended Sections: Progress steps indicator (Cart > Shipping > Payment > Confirm), Promo code input, Trust badges (SSL/money-back), Express checkout (PayPal/Apple Pay)
Nav Requirements: Minimal nav: Logo only + progress steps, No main navigation (prevent abandonment)
SEO Requirements: noindex nofollow | Title: Checkout - Product | No schema needed
Internal Links: Back to Cart, Link to Shipping/Return policy, Order confirmation → Thank you page
Common Violations: No order summary visible, Missing trust badges, No progress indicator, Too many form fields, No express checkout option

Required Sections: Error message (clear and friendly), Back to Home button/link, Search bar
Recommended Sections: Suggested popular pages, Fun illustration or animation, Recent blog posts
Nav Requirements: Main site nav (help users navigate away)
SEO Requirements: noindex | Title: Page Not Found - Product | No schema needed
Internal Links: Back to Home, Search → Search Results, Suggested pages → popular sections
Common Violations: Generic error message, No navigation options, No search bar, Broken layout, Missing back to home link

Required Sections: Contact form (name/email/subject/message), Email and phone info, Physical address or map
Recommended Sections: FAQ link section, Social media links, Office hours, Department selector, Live chat widget
SEO Requirements: Title: Contact Us - Product | index follow | Schema: ContactPage + LocalBusiness | OG with contact info
Internal Links: FAQ link → FAQ page, Form submit → Thank you page, Social links → external profiles
Common Violations: No form validation feedback, Missing required field indicators, No success/error message after submit, No alternative contact methods

Required Sections: Company story/history, Team members section, Mission and values statement
Recommended Sections: Company timeline, Key stats/achievements, Partner/client logos, Office photos, Career CTA, Awards
Footer Requirements: Same as landing footer + Career link
SEO Requirements: Title: About Us - Product | index follow | Schema: AboutPage + Organization | OG with team photo
Internal Links: Nav → Careers/Jobs, Team → individual profiles if available, CTA → Contact page, Footer → all main sections
Common Violations: No team photos, Missing company values, Too much text without visuals, No CTA to contact or careers
